definition: shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Most of them run part of the journey and I can not get to my destination directly.
sentences.chinese: 因为很多车都是区间车，不能直接到中信。

sentences.english: Please mind the coming eastbound train will terminate at Chang Ying Station.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，即将进站列车为以常营站为终点站的区间车。

definition: public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
grade/class number (in school)/flight or run number/flight or run (seen as an item)/shift (work period)
